CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISBLANK(animalos__Date_of_Birth__c), ISBLANK(animalos__Incoming_Date__c)), '', TEXT(FLOOR((DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c )/365.25)) &' YEARS' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c),365.25)/30.44)) &' MONTHS' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(MOD((DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c),365.25),30.44))) &' DAYS')
CustomField.label: Age at Arrival
